About.Title: About
About.Text: I am Geetanjali Sharma, a Software Developer at DePronto Infotech. In my current role, I have gained valuable experience in front-end development, with a focus on technologies such as React.js, JSP, jQuery and various CSS frameworks like (Mui, AntD).

Items.Description: In my current role at Depronto Infotech, I have gained valuable experience in front-end development, with a focus on technologies such as React.js, JSP, and jQuery. My hands-on experience in these technologies has equipped me with the ability to create responsive and user-friendly web applications. I have successfully contributed to the development of innovative solutions that have not only met but exceeded client expectations. I have also been of deployments. I have done 20+ UATs and 5+ Live movements.

I have also done my internship in DePronto itself, as a part a R&D team there I was the one handling the front-end part of 3 Projects at a time which made me recognize my multi-tasking skills. Gained proficiency in front-end development, best practices, and version control using Git.
